title: Disco

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Play some music (Youtube, Spotify etc)
• Connect switches to the bubble machine and disco light (if switch adapted) If not, plug the mains controlled disco light and bubble machine into the I-Click-On and plug in the switches
• The switch user can control the lights and bubbles for the disco.

tooltipText: Use a Click-It-On (or similar) or two switch adapted toys to control lights and bubbles for a disco
